item.title: LIVE: Trump and Netanyahu speak after meeting
item.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events

item.title: Israel-Gaza live updates: Netanyahu meets with Trump at Mar-a-Lago
item.description: Sporadic clashes between the Israel Defense Forces and Gaza militants -- plus deadly IDF strikes -- continue despite the Gaza ceasefire.

item.title: WATCH: Woman shocked to discover her childhood pen pal was her obstetrician
item.description: Megan Lewis was astonished to discover that her pen pal from over 30 years ago was her OB/GYN that delivered her two children.

item.title: Trump says US 'knocked out' a 'big facility' in Venezuela
item.description: President Donald Trump said that the United States "knocked out" a "big facility" in Venezuela last week.

item.title: Boxer Anthony Joshua injured in car accident that killed 2 other people
